post.body: He _needs_ encouragement :D
get the itouch/iphone app :P
I'm addicted to Threadless.com. I love the Type Tees :)
ya know what I'm like when I get behind a pair of CDJs or 1200s. I can't help get a lil bit creative and crazy.
want me to upload the mix we made earlier today. you seemed a little more "cheerier" after spinning some cwaaazy choons?
I wouldn't call dropping Jazzmopper J (my copy, spankyouverymuch) and d-t3ch an angry kind'o mix. just letting ya know ;)
Happy birthday!!
You are sweet like Sweet William chocolate. I bash you up when I next see you. Thanks for the "flours". 
Beyond angry. Beyond furious. How could I be so damn forgiving? Fer flippery flip's sake. AARGH!
Up and being partially lazy for a Sunday. It's sizzly outside. Sizzly weather is good.
Vale Zlatko A aka the Big Z. I'll never forget you, mate. ♫ http://blip.fm/~18k5g
Sending hugs out to all that need hugs at the moment. Catching up on tweets and oh mang, I just wanna hug the twooterverse :( *hugs*
The eyeshadow and eyeliner made you look like something from outer space. You shone like a star in the night sk... ♫ http://blip.fm/~18k30
Many a night was spent in @dopaminekid's garage, mucking about on the decks and him dancing as if he were at Room on a Saturday night.
Back home. Safe but not sound. Trying to figure out many a thing or three. Lost a good mate and going on a blip.fm spree in memory of Big Z.
Out of the shadows and into the light and then back home. I remember when we used to dance to this. Miss you so... ♫ http://blip.fm/~18k1c
Going on a vodka fuelled Twitterless safari. Lions, tigers, ligers and bureaucratic monkeys. Oh my!! Bye bye for a long time. 
Thankful for true friends. Hoping I can talk to Womby tonight. I need it 
Waiting..waiting..
http://twitpic.com/u023 - Balloons!! At my desk. OMG! I  my work buddies.
